tool_description: Database API. Endpoints offer access to robust database accessibility.
name: Datapi
title: Datapi

api_list.name: Make ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://datapi1.p.rapidapi.com/id"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "datapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://datapi1.p.rapidapi.com/get/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "datapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
